documents.document: Why is it that I always get the Hanzo/Mercy team on 3v3 Elimination against an Ana/Hog/Widow...

Today I am planning on fighting jet lag purely through countless games of Overwatch. Zarya I have missed you.
You can argue about Trump as much as you want but who can argue with a gif of an adorable kitten or pupper?
So like how long until the internet dials it down on Trump? Protests are good and all but everybody could use some cat/dog gifs and chill.
I wonder if @billburr will read his child a fairytale the same way he does the ad reads on the @theMMPodcast
Air France really wasn't fucking around today. At this rate I'll be back in Perth in like four hours.
Lyon to Paris flight was meant to be 75min. Pilot comes on 45mins in "The shortcuts have been v successful, beginning our descent" WHAT
Protesting is great, but destroying public/private property totally undoes whatever you're standing for. #ProtestTrump

I get the feeling #2017 will be a lot like my New Years party. Great fun until midnight, then politely waiting 2hrs for everyone to leave.
Just threw out a bunch of old boxes in storage. Anyone going through my recylcing will think I had some great Christmas presents for 2011.

She is at one with the Force, and the Force is with her. #RIPCarrieFisher
Literally woke up at 3am in the morning, checked my phone and saw that #CarrieFisher had passed away. I'm completely speechless.
Of course #2016 would try and kill #CarrieFisher at the end. I hope she pulls through.
It wouldn't be Christmas Eve without a wild panic to buy last minute presents before heading back to the farm...
@Vakarians @thegrandtour pretty sure Clarkson almost had a tear in his eye it was done so beautifully

@TyronePeiris absolutely, I'm going to be viewing it in theaters a few times alone just for the last act. Amazing!
I haven't played #Overwatch since #Titanfall2 came out but the Winter Wonderland event is making me seriously consider jumping back in.
Hell, the entire third act of #RogueOne was phenomenal. Not without fault, but still such a strong start to the Star Wars anthology films.
The final scene of #RogueOne is one of the best in the entire Star Wars series. Nailed something we've all wanted to see for a long time.
Perfect thing to listen to for the end of the week at work. #RogueOne https://t.co/HoeRjWj7LH
So Australia has decided to start blocking torrent websites? Well jokes on you I was going to buy #RogueOne on blu-ray anyway.
I am here to see at Star War. #RogueOne https://t.co/k9UxSfcYcc
#Titanfall2 is the best FPS I've played for years (excluding Overwatch) Really hoping it's sales pick up for Christmas...
I haven't seen the track listing for the #RogueOne score but I'm hoping that @m_giacchino has been able to sneak in a pun somewhere...
I'd be lying if I said I was here for anything except hearing Star Wars theme. #wasositc https://t.co/86FBjtTUUK
Could @Showtime please renew @SHO_Shameless for season 8. I'm really getting nervous this season is the end... #shameless
Saw 'Your Name' today, it left me absolutely speechless. One of the best anime films I have ever seen, cannot recommend it enough! #YourName
'Mass Effect Andromeda looks like The Witcher 3 in space!' IT'S INQUISITION IN SPACE NOT THE WITCHER GOD DAMMIT

Got my #RogueOne midnight screening tickets I am set to have a happy December now.

With the PC release of #watch_dogs_2 delay I'm gonna be a bit disappointed if there are any bad issues on launch. Ubisoft please do good.

Just started Season 4 of The West Wing and President Bartlet winning re-election is the most surreal experience given the past week IRL.
